Posts.Content: Â I was 31, new in the area, and without health insurance when I was diagnosed with leukemia and breast cancer. My only possibility for a cure was a bone marrow transplant. In dealing with the pain from related treatments, I discovered that acupuncture in combination with milder medications gave me the greatest pain relief.. Read my full sroty of survival www.mesothelioma-pains.blogspot.com
Posts.Title: How i survived of cancer
